org.hibernate.jpa.criteria.path

Class SingularAttributeJoin<O,X>

  • java.lang.Object

      • org.hibernate.jpa.criteria.expression.AbstractTupleElement<X>
        • org.hibernate.jpa.criteria.expression.SelectionImpl<T>

                • org.hibernate.jpa.criteria.path.AbstractJoinImpl<O,X>
                  • org.hibernate.jpa.criteria.path.SingularAttributeJoin<O,X>
  • Type Parameters:
    O - Represents the parameterized type of the attribute owner
    X - Represents the parameterized type of the attribute
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Expression<X>, Fetch<O,X>, FetchParent<O,X>, From<O,X>, Join<O,X>, Path<X>, Selection<X>, TupleElement<X>, ExpressionImplementor<X>, FromImplementor<O,X>, JoinImplementor<O,X>, ParameterContainer, PathImplementor<X>, PathSource<X>, Renderable, SelectionImplementor<X>, TupleElementImplementor<X>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    SingularAttributeJoin.TreatedSingularAttributeJoin

    public class SingularAttributeJoin<O,X>
extends AbstractJoinImpl<O,X>
    Models a join based on a singular attribute
